content.query:
use nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS gold.vw_gold_trip_data_green 
GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_gold_trip_data_green 
AS
SELECT * FROM
    OPENROWSET  
        (
            BULK 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
            FORMAT='parquet'
        ) AS result
